artefact.overview: You need to register as a children's home if you provide boarding for students for more than 295 days in the year
artefact.licence_short_description: Register as a children's home if you provide boarding for students for more than 295 days in the year.
artefact.licence_overview: If you operate an independent school that provides boarding for more than 295 days in a year, your school is defined as a children's home. You need to register the school with the [Department for Education](http://www.education.gov.uk/ "Department for Education"){:rel="external"} and the home with [Ofsted Children's Directorate](http://www.ofsted.gov.uk/ "Ofsted"){:rel="external"} in England or the [Care and Social Services Inspectorate Wales (CSSIW).](http://wales.gov.uk/cssiwsubsite/newcssiw/?lang=en "Care and Social Services Inspectorate Wales (CSSIW)"){:rel="external"}
